analyzerFeedback.learnMore:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to learn more about automated feedback
**UI Location**: Solution page → Analyzer Feedback section → Explanation text
**When Users See This**: When reviewing automated feedback on their solution
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Learn more"
comment.essential:
**Functional Purpose**: Tag indicating essential feedback
**UI Location**: Solution page → Analyzer Feedback section → Individual comment tag
**When Users See This**: When an analyzer comment is categorized as essential
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Essential"
comment.recommended:
**Functional Purpose**: Tag indicating recommended feedback
**UI Location**: Solution page → Analyzer Feedback section → Individual comment tag
**When Users See This**: When an analyzer comment is categorized as recommended
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Recommended"
